content:
A bug report: the numbering of interrupted lists is inconsistent between the new and old apps:

  1. This is item 1 on both

This is an interruption

  1. This is item 2, but only on the old app
A message was moved here from #Zulip meta > flutter beta by Chris Bobbe.

Thanks for the report, @Eric Wieser! This is a known gap in our message content parser that will be straightforward to implement: https://github.com/zulip/zulip-flutter/issues/59

I've noted your request on the issue, and in the Zulip development community: https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/channel/48-mobile/topic/mark.20all.20as.20unread/near/2018402
That issue is fixed in today's mobile beta release v0.0.27. Thanks again for the report @Eric Wieser!
